summary: It helps you get all 4 attributes of all ingredients in just a few steps. Especially recommended for new characters, if you don\'t want to spend a long time trying to find attributes through normal gameplay.
descriptionHtml:
This gives you the perks that allow you to find all 4 attributes by eating an ingredient.
Then you get all ingredients.
You eat them, to get the attributes.
You remove the perks.

How it happens is it adds 2 batch files (text documents with console commands in them), which you run ingame via the console with the bat command. That executes all commands in those 2 files. The 2 files are:
ia: this one adds the 3 Experimenter Perks in the Alchemy tree and 1 of all ingredients except Crimson Nirnroot. It starts a quest so that\'s why i didn\'t add it.
ia2: removes the 3 Experimenter Perks in the Alchemy tree

Install/Use:
1. Download, extract files
2. Place ia and ia 2 in your Skyrim directory, where SkyrimLauncher and TESV are located (NOT in the Data folder)
3. Start game, load your savegame, open console, click on your character with the mouse and type: bat ia
4. Go to your inventory and eat 1 of each ingredient
5. Open console, (make sure your character is targeted) and type: bat ia2
Done.
author: Shallala
